title: Default Bias Suppression
description: Detects when systems assume a single statistical 'average' body, health profile, or lifestyle as the universal baseline, erasing diversity and treating those outside the mean as anomalies or invisible.
indicators: Retail or health systems optimized only for one demographic profile
Ads targeting statistical averages while misfiring on real contexts
Medical or policy defaults that exclude outlier cases
Erasure of diversity by assuming universality of one baseline
